name: Chaos;Head
storyline: The game's premise revolves around a high school student named Takumi Nishijo who unknowingly walks into the scene of a gruesome murder on his way home. More mysterious events start happening afterwards as more gruesome murders occur in the area. Takumi struggles to cope with reality and the delusions he experiences as he tries to avoid getting caught by the perpetrator behind the chain of murders.
summary: Chaos;Head is a Japanese visual novel. It is the first game in the Science Adventure series.
